slide.title: Welcome to ClearSky !
lines: With the next few pages we’ll try and help you setup your multi-pollutions sensing system.
Depending on your familiarity with the Raspberry Pi, the process may take up to 15 minutes.

slide.title: Setting up the Raspberry Pi
lines: First up, you need to get a Raspberry Pi with internet connectivity.
We recommend heading over to https://projects.raspberrypi.org for a quick tutorial on getting started.

slide.title: Setting up the sensors
lines: To have an accurate estimate of the air quality in your area, you’ll need to buy sensors for the most common types of pollutants.

slide.title: Setting up ClearSky
lines: Please download and install ClearSky in your Raspberry Pi
After restarting, your Raspberry should now start reading the data from the sensors.
Next up, configuring the mobile app to visualize this data !
